targets.rawSql: SELECT "Sri Lanka"

SELECT
  createdAt AS "time",
  statusReportId
FROM dashboard_status_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(createdAt)
ORDER BY createdAt

SELECT CONCAT(
          COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),
          ' - ', ROUND(COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
       ) AS tallySheetCount
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countingCentreAreaMap.*,
            election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
            CONCAT(countingCentreAreaMap.pollingDivisionName, " / ", countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreName) as tallySheetAreaLabel
        FROM
            submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
            (
                SELECT
                    areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                    areaMap.pollingDivisionId, areaMap.pollingDivisionName,
                    areaMap.countingCentreId, areaMap.countingCentreName
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                            electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                            pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                            pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                            pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                            electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                            districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                            countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                        FROM
                            area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                            area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                            area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                            area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                            area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,

                            area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                            area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                            area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                        WHERE
                            country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                            and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId

                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId

                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId

                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId

                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId

                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                            and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                            and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                            and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                    ) as areaMap
                GROUP BY
                    areaMap.countryId,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId,
                    areaMap.pollingDivisionId,
                    areaMap.countingCentreId
            ) as countingCentreAreaMap
        WHERE
            tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
            and election.electionId = submission.electionId
            and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
            and submission.areaId = countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreId

        UNION ALL

        SELECT
            tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, pollingDivisionAreaMap.*,
            election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
            pollingDivisionAreaMap.pollingDivisionName as tallySheetAreaLabel
        FROM
            submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
            (
                SELECT
                    areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                    areaMap.pollingDivisionId, areaMap.pollingDivisionName,
                    NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                            electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                            pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                            pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                            pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                            electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                            districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                            countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                        FROM
                            area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                            area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                            area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                            area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                            area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,

                            area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                            area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                            area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                        WHERE
                            country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                            and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId

                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId

                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId

                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId

                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId

                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                            and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                            and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                            and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                    ) as areaMap
                GROUP BY
                    areaMap.countryId,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId,
                    areaMap.pollingDivisionId
            ) as pollingDivisionAreaMap
        WHERE
            tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
            and election.electionId = submission.electionId
            and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
            and submission.areaId = pollingDivisionAreaMap.pollingDivisionId

        UNION ALL

        SELECT
            tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, electoralDistrictAreaMap.*,
            election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
            electoralDistrictAreaMap.electoralDistrictName as tallySheetAreaLabel
        FROM
            submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
            (
                SELECT
                    areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                    NULL AS pollingDivisionId, NULL AS pollingDivisionName,
                    NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                            electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                            pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                            pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                            pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                            electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                            districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                            countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                        FROM
                            area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                            area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                            area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                            area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                            area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,

                            area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                            area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                            area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                        WHERE
                            country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                            and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId

                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId

                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId

                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId

                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId

                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                            and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                            and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                            and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                    ) as areaMap
                GROUP BY
                    areaMap.countryId,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId
            ) as electoralDistrictAreaMap
        WHERE
            tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
            and election.electionId = submission.electionId
            and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
            and submission.areaId = electoralDistrictAreaMap.electoralDistrictId

        UNION ALL

        SELECT
            tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countryAreaMap.*,
            election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
            countryAreaMap.countryName as tallySheetAreaLabel
        FROM
            submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
            (
                SELECT
                    areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                    NULL AS electoralDistrictId, NULL AS electoralDistrictName,
                    NULL AS pollingDivisionId, NULL AS pollingDivisionName,
                    NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                            electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                            pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                            pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                            pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                            electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                            districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                            countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                        FROM
                            area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                            area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                            area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                            area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                            area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,

                            area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                            area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                            area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                        WHERE
                            country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                            and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId

                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId

                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId

                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId

                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId

                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                            and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                            and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                            and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                    ) as areaMap
                GROUP BY
                    areaMap.countryId
            ) as countryAreaMap
        WHERE
            tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
            and election.electionId = submission.electionId
            and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
            and submission.areaId = countryAreaMap.countryId
    ) AS areaMappedTallySheet
WHERE
    areaMappedTallySheet.rootElectionId = $rootElectionId
    and areaMappedTallySheet.voteType = "NonPostal"
    and areaMappedTallySheet.templateName = "PE-27"

SELECT 
  CONCAT(
    COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),
    ' - ', ROUND(COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  )
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      areaMappedTallySheet.templateName,
      areaMappedTallySheet.voteType,
      areaMappedTallySheet.pollingDivisionId AS pollingDivisionId,
      areaMappedTallySheet.electoralDistrictId AS electoralDistrictId,
      COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)) AS verifiedTallySheetCount,
      COUNT(*) AS tallySheetCount
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countingCentreAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                CONCAT(countingCentreAreaMap.pollingDivisionName, " / ", countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreName) as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId, areaMap.pollingDivisionName,
                        areaMap.countingCentreId, areaMap.countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM
                                area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,
    
                                area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                                area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                                area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                                area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,
    
                                area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                                area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                                area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                            WHERE
                                country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                                and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
    
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
    
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
    
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
    
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
    
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                                and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                        ) as areaMap
                    GROUP BY
                        areaMap.countryId,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId,
                        areaMap.countingCentreId
                ) as countingCentreAreaMap
            WHERE
                tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
                and election.electionId = submission.electionId
                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
                and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
                and submission.areaId = countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreId
    
            UNION ALL
    
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, pollingDivisionAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                pollingDivisionAreaMap.pollingDivisionName as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId, areaMap.pollingDivisionName,
                        NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM
                                area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,
    
                                area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                                area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                                area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                                area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,
    
                                area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                                area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                                area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                            WHERE
                                country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                                and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
    
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
    
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
    
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
    
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
    
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                                and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                        ) as areaMap
                    GROUP BY
                        areaMap.countryId,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId
                ) as pollingDivisionAreaMap
            WHERE
                tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
                and election.electionId = submission.electionId
                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
                and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
                and submission.areaId = pollingDivisionAreaMap.pollingDivisionId
    
            UNION ALL
    
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, electoralDistrictAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                electoralDistrictAreaMap.electoralDistrictName as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                        NULL AS pollingDivisionId, NULL AS pollingDivisionName,
                        NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM
                                area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,
    
                                area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                                area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                                area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                                area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,
    
                                area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                                area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                                area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                            WHERE
                                country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                                and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
    
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
    
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
    
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
    
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
    
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                                and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                        ) as areaMap
                    GROUP BY
                        areaMap.countryId,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId
                ) as electoralDistrictAreaMap
            WHERE
                tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
                and election.electionId = submission.electionId

        FROM

                    ) as areaMap
                GROUP BY

        WHERE
            tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId

            and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
            and submission.areaId = pollingDivisionAreaMap.pollingDivisionId

        UNION ALL

        SELECT
            tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, electoralDistrictAreaMap.*,
            election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
            electoralDistrictAreaMap.electoralDistrictName as tallySheetAreaLabel
        FROM
            submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
            (
                SELECT
                    areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                    NULL AS pollingDivisionId, NULL AS pollingDivisionName,
                    NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT

                            electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                            pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                            pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                            pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                            electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,

                            area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,

                            and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"

        WHERE

            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
            and submission.areaId = electoralDistrictAreaMap.electoralDistrictId

        UNION ALL

        SELECT
            tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countryAreaMap.*,
            election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
            countryAreaMap.countryName as tallySheetAreaLabel
        FROM
            submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
            (
                SELECT
                    areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                    NULL AS electoralDistrictId, NULL AS electoralDistrictName,
                    NULL AS pollingDivisionId, NULL AS pollingDivisionName,
                    NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                            electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                            pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                            pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                            pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                            electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                            districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                            countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                        FROM
                            area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                            area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                            area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                            area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                            area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,

                            area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                            area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                            area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                        WHERE
                            country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                            and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId

                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId

                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId

                            and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId

                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId

                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"

                            and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                    ) as areaMap

        WHERE

            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId

WHERE
    areaMappedTallySheet.rootElectionId = $rootElectionId
    and areaMappedTallySheet.voteType = "NonPostal"
    and areaMappedTallySheet.templateName = "CE-201"

SELECT 
  CONCAT(
    COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),
    ' - ', ROUND(COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  )
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      areaMappedTallySheet.templateName,
      areaMappedTallySheet.voteType,
      areaMappedTallySheet.pollingDivisionId AS pollingDivisionId,
      areaMappedTallySheet.electoralDistrictId AS electoralDistrictId,
      COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)) AS verifiedTallySheetCount,
      COUNT(*) AS tallySheetCount
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countingCentreAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                CONCAT(countingCentreAreaMap.pollingDivisionName, " / ", countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreName) as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId, areaMap.pollingDivisionName,
                        areaMap.countingCentreId, areaMap.countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM
                                area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,
    
                                area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                                area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                                area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                                area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,
    
                                area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                                area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                                area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                            WHERE
                                country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                                and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
    
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
    
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
    
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
    
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
    
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                                and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                        ) as areaMap
                    GROUP BY
                        areaMap.countryId,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId,
                        areaMap.countingCentreId
                ) as countingCentreAreaMap
            WHERE
                tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
                and election.electionId = submission.electionId
                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
                and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
                and submission.areaId = countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreId
    
            UNION ALL
    
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, pollingDivisionAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                pollingDivisionAreaMap.pollingDivisionName as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId, areaMap.pollingDivisionName,
                        NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM
                                area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,
    
                                area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                                area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                                area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                                area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,
    
                                area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                                area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                                area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                            WHERE
                                country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                                and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
    
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
    
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
    
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
    
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
    
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                                and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                        ) as areaMap
                    GROUP BY
                        areaMap.countryId,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId,
                        areaMap.pollingDivisionId
                ) as pollingDivisionAreaMap
            WHERE
                tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId
                and election.electionId = submission.electionId
                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
                and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
                and submission.areaId = pollingDivisionAreaMap.pollingDivisionId
    
            UNION ALL
    
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, electoralDistrictAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                electoralDistrictAreaMap.electoralDistrictName as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                        NULL AS pollingDivisionId, NULL AS pollingDivisionName,
                        NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM
                                area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,
    
                                area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                                area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                                area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                                area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,
    
                                area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                                area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                                area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                            WHERE
                                country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                                and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
    
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
    
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
    
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId

                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId

                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                                and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"

                    GROUP BY

            WHERE
                tallySheet.tallySheetId = submission.submissionId

                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
                and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
                and submission.areaId = electoralDistrictAreaMap.electoralDistrictId
    
            UNION ALL
    
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countryAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                countryAreaMap.countryName as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        NULL AS electoralDistrictId, NULL AS electoralDistrictName,
                        NULL AS pollingDivisionId, NULL AS pollingDivisionName,
                        NULL AS countingCentreId, NULL AS countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM

                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                                area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,

                                area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                            WHERE
                                country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                                and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
    
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                                and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
    
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.parentAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId
                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
    
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.parentAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.parentAreaId = electionCommission.areaId
                                and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
    
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
    
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"
                                and pollingStation.areaType = "PollingStation" and countingCentre.areaType = "CountingCentre"
                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"

            WHERE

                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
                and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
                and submission.areaId = countryAreaMap.countryId
        ) AS areaMappedTallySheet
    WHERE

    GROUP BY

      areaMappedTallySheet.voteType,
      areaMappedTallySheet.pollingDivisionId,
      areaMappedTallySheet.electoralDistrictId
      
  ) as pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics
WHERE
  pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.templateName = "CE-201"
  and pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.voteType = "NonPostal"

SELECT 
  CONCAT(
    COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),
    ' - ', ROUND(COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  )
FROM
  (
    SELECT

    FROM

                CONCAT(countingCentreAreaMap.pollingDivisionName, " / ", countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreName) as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,

                        areaMap.countingCentreId, areaMap.countingCentreName
                    FROM
                        (
                            SELECT
                                country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,

SELECT

FROM dashboard_status_report

SELECT CONCAT(
          COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),

       ) AS tallySheetCount
FROM

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                            area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                            area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                            area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,

                            area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                            area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,

                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId

                            and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId

                            and electionCommission_districtCentre.childAreaId = districtCentre.areaId

                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.parentAreaId = districtCentre.areaId
                            and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId

                            and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                            and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"

            ) as countryAreaMap
        WHERE

            and election.electionId = submission.electionId
            and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
            and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId
            and submission.areaId = countryAreaMap.countryId
    ) AS areaMappedTallySheet
WHERE
    areaMappedTallySheet.rootElectionId = $rootElectionId
    and areaMappedTallySheet.voteType = "NonPostal"
    and areaMappedTallySheet.templateName = "PE-4"

SELECT

FROM

    FROM

                CONCAT(countingCentreAreaMap.pollingDivisionName, " / ", countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreName) as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM

                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,

                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,

                            FROM

                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"

            FROM

                    FROM

            FROM

            FROM

                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,

                countryAreaMap.countryName as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM
                submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
                (
                    SELECT
                        areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                        NULL AS electoralDistrictId, NULL AS electoralDistrictName,

                    FROM

                            FROM

                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

WHERE

SELECT

    COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),
    ' - ', ROUND(COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  )
FROM

    SELECT

    FROM

                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"

            WHERE

                and election.electionId = submission.electionId
                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId
                and workflowInstance.workflowInstanceId = tallySheet.workflowInstanceId

            FROM

                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,

            FROM

                                electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                                pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                                pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                                pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                                electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                                districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM

                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

SELECT
  createdAt AS "time",
  statusReportId
FROM dashboard_status_report
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(createdAt)
ORDER BY createdAt

SELECT CONCAT(
          COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),
          ' - ', ROUND(COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
       ) AS tallySheetCount
FROM
    (
        SELECT
            tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countingCentreAreaMap.*,
            election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
            CONCAT(countingCentreAreaMap.pollingDivisionName, " / ", countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreName) as tallySheetAreaLabel
        FROM
            submission, tallySheet, template, workflowInstance, election,
            (
                SELECT
                    areaMap.countryId, areaMap.countryName,
                    areaMap.electoralDistrictId, areaMap.electoralDistrictName,
                    areaMap.pollingDivisionId, areaMap.pollingDivisionName,
                    areaMap.countingCentreId, areaMap.countingCentreName
                FROM
                    (
                        SELECT
                            country.areaId as countryId, country.areaName as countryName,
                            electoralDistrict.areaId as electoralDistrictId, electoralDistrict.areaName as electoralDistrictName,
                            pollingDivision.areaId as pollingDivisionId, pollingDivision.areaName as pollingDivisionName,
                            pollingDistrict.areaId as pollingDistrictId, pollingDistrict.areaName as pollingDistrictName,
                            pollingStation.areaId as pollingStationId, pollingStation.areaName as pollingStationName,
                            electionCommission.areaId as electionCommissionId, electionCommission.areaName as electionCommissionName,
                            districtCentre.areaId as districtCentreId, districtCentre.areaName as districtCentreName,
                            countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                        FROM
                            area country, area electoralDistrict, area pollingDivision, area pollingDistrict, area pollingStation,
                            area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                            area_area country_electoralDistrict,
                            area_area electoralDistrict_pollingDivision,
                            area_area pollingDivision_pollingDistrict,
                            area_area pollingDistrict_pollingStation,

                            area_area electionCommission_districtCentre,
                            area_area districtCentre_countingCentre,
                            area_area countingCentre_pollingStation
                        WHERE
                            country_electoralDistrict.parentAreaId = country.areaId
                            and country_electoralDistrict.childAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId

                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.parentAreaId = electoralDistrict.areaId
                            and electoralDistrict_pollingDivision.childAreaId = pollingDivision.areaId

WHERE

SELECT 
  CONCAT(
    COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)), "/", COUNT(*),
    ' - ', ROUND(COUNT(IF(pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.verifiedTallySheetCount = pollingDivisionWiseTallySheetStatistics.tallySheetCount, 1, NULL)) * 100 / COUNT(*), 0), "%"
  )
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      areaMappedTallySheet.templateName,
      areaMappedTallySheet.voteType,
      areaMappedTallySheet.pollingDivisionId AS pollingDivisionId,
      areaMappedTallySheet.electoralDistrictId AS electoralDistrictId,
      COUNT(IF(areaMappedTallySheet.status = 'Verified', 1, NULL)) AS verifiedTallySheetCount,
      COUNT(*) AS tallySheetCount
    FROM
        (
            SELECT
                tallySheet.tallySheetId, workflowInstance.status, template.templateName, countingCentreAreaMap.*,
                election.electionId, election.voteType, election.rootElectionId,
                CONCAT(countingCentreAreaMap.pollingDivisionName, " / ", countingCentreAreaMap.countingCentreName) as tallySheetAreaLabel
            FROM

                                countingCentre.areaId as countingCentreId, countingCentre.areaName as countingCentreName
                            FROM

                                area electionCommission, area districtCentre, area countingCentre,

                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId

                                and pollingDistrict_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId

                                and districtCentre_countingCentre.childAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
    
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.parentAreaId = countingCentre.areaId
                                and countingCentre_pollingStation.childAreaId = pollingStation.areaId
    
                                and country.areaType = "Country" and electoralDistrict.areaType = "ElectoralDistrict"
                                and pollingDivision.areaType = "PollingDivision" and pollingDistrict.areaType = "PollingDistrict"

                                and districtCentre.areaType = "DistrictCentre" and electionCommission.areaType = "ElectionCommission"
                        ) as areaMap

                and template.templateId = tallySheet.templateId

                                and pollingDivision_pollingDistrict.childAreaId = pollingDistrict.areaId
